charges.charge_description: 18:844 Conveyed false information by telephone concerning alleged attempts being made to kill, injure or intimidate by means of explosives (1)

charges.charge_disposition: Deft Soliday placed on probation for a term of 2 years; deft shall complete a period of 6 months home confinement with electronic monitoring; no fine; restitution of $1, 883.74; $100.00 sp. assessment. (1)

charges.charge_description: in a matter within the jurisdiction of a department or agency of the United States knowingly and wilfully did falsify, conceal and cover up by trick, scheme and device a material fact, in violation of 18:1001 [2:97-m-22]

charges.charge_disposition: Deft Soliday placed on probation for a term of 2 years; deft shall complete a period of 6 months home confinement with electronic monitoring; no fine; restitution of $1, 883.74; $100.00 sp. assessment. (-1)
